Description.Text: Hotel Ferdinando II is 2 minutes' walk from the Botanical Gardens, and 1.5 km from Napoli Centrale Train Station. Rooms are air-conditioned and have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Wi-Fi is free at the Ferdinando II, which also has a 24-hour front desk and a bar. Breakfast is served on the roof garden with views of the gardens and the Vomero hills. The rooms are complete with CD player, minibar and tea/coffee maker. Each room is decorated in contemporary, neutral colours. Naples Capodichino Airport is 3.4 km away.
For its strategic position at few steps from the main monuments of the city and shopping streets, it is an ideal location for who stays in Naples for work or pleasure.

Spacious and elegant are equipped with every comfort: air conditioning, heating with individual control, television with satellite dish connected to the main international channels, pay TV, telephone, safe, tea and coffee making facilities, minibar, internet access. The bathrooms, finished in marble, are equipped with telephone and alarm and a special body care line.
Hotel has no restaurant, just a breakfast room
